alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 5:47PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Increasing Snow Threats Sunday night Through Thursday... A front will usher in a period of wintery weather conditions for most of the Interior beginning Sunday night. This first initial front will bring widespread snowfall with a general range of 2 to 4 inches possible, locally heavier amounts to the west of Fairbanks of 4 to 7 inches, through Tuesday. A second storm moving into the Interior on Wednesday will bring chances for more snowfall of several inches possible through Thursday of next week. Residents should be aware of this change in the weather pattern after a quiet weekend of weather.
